author: Sara Fischer
title: Coronavirus is being used to suppress press freedoms globally
description: Coronavirus is providing cover to autocrats, dictators, and even some democratically-elected leaders who were already looking for reasons to undermine the independent media. Driving the news: Recent examples show the press is being shut out by the government …
content:
The coronavirus is providing cover to autocrats, dictators, and even some democratically-elected leaders who were already looking for reasons to undermine the independent media.
